## Version 2.0.0.0 | 16 November 2022

* Created, erm, site patch notes.
* Site is now entirely remade in [Quarto](https://quarto.org).
* UI overhaul.
* ForBlog is no longer the main landing page.
* App playground has been added; a place where I can host my various creations.

New...

* favicon.
* about me page.
* landing page.
* ForBlog home page.
* ForBlog post layout.
* global search bar.

Added...

* a ForBlog only search bar.
* ForBlog post filters.
* ForBlog and App Playground subscriptions.
* a form for site feedback.
* copyright licences.
* new fancy buttons.
